item.description: We had so much fun back in November at Bowl-a-rama that we?re going to try it again? this time at Spare Time bowling lanes, 408 Talcottville Rd, Vernon, Ct. (phone at the lanes is 860-875-2583). Directions, From I-84 take exit 64-65 and follow Routhe 83 north. Bowling lanes on the right. 12 people is the maximum allowed, so sign up early! 2 lanes $56.00 a lane w/ a pizza and a pitcher of soda, unlimited bowling 7pm -to 9pm, free shoe rental. This will work out to approximately $15 per person for the night. More people....more fun....less money. More pizza's can be ordered. Be sure to RSVP. See you all there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the entry area at 6:45 to get our shoes and our lane assignment
item.name: A night at the lanes
